item.title: First Brew
item.description: My introduction into the coffee world is probably very similar to anyone born and raised in New England: Dunkin Donuts. The earliest drink I can remember getting from Dunkin was when I was in high school. It was their Hazelnut Coffee Coolata - a blended ice heavy-on-the-quotation-marks “coffee” drink that must’ve been 98% sugar and 2% coffee and/or coffee flavoring, served in an American-large plastic cup with a bright orange and pink straw.
